#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: simpleType CourseRating.

== Name ==

*[SCourseRating CourseRating]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
float
  |
  +--CourseRating (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
			Type to specify the golf course rating for handicap calculation.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===

	inclusive lower bound: 3inclusive upper bound: 90

----
    

===  Local Usage ===

    	[CHoleQualificationUSGA HoleQualificationUSGA]
----
    <xs:simpleType name="CourseRating">  <xs:restriction base="xs:float">    <xs:minInclusive value="3"/>    <xs:maxInclusive value="90"/>  </xs:restriction></xs:simpleType>
----
